item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:78 Chances: Comcast’s expansion of its broadband network to seven cities shows a commitment to investing in future growth opportunities Partnership with Volkswagen of America to target consumers across NBCU’s portfolio indicates potential for increased advertising revenue Investment in Showmax’s video streaming platform in partnership with MultiChoice Group demonstrates potential for growth in the streaming market Risks: Competition in the pay-TV market has been intensifying, with Charter overtaking Comcast as the No.
